page.title: 14NEWCOMER TO INGLEBY A.
page.content: Mrs Wrigley has lived in Ingleby Arncliffe for nearly 3 years. Before that she lived in Solihull near Birmingham. She has two sons who attend the village school, and a dog and two rabbits. Her husband works in a bank in Middlesbrough. Mrs Wrigley is a supply teacher and has taught recently in a Middlesbrough school. She enjoys living in the village because it is quiet and she has made friends quickly. The family all enjoy walking in the beautiful countryside nearby. She plays in the local pub's darts team and is on the P.T.A. Committee of the village school. However she has to travel by car to do much of her shopping in Teesside, and to take her sons to activities outside the village, such as swimming and cubs.
